title: Jazz Willisau
description: Top two thirds of poster are the swiss flag with a blue background and a yellow cross. The bottom third is the traditionally colored swiss flag, cut off by the irregularly-colored flag at the top. Viseulle Aufforderung zum EU-Beitritt der Schweiz von Nikalus Troxler, Willisau und Siedbruck Bosch AG Stans/ Luzen
name: Poster
